name: Cold Melon Soup

ingredients.name: Beaumes de Venise, Pineau des Charentes, or Muscat
Nourish Broth Mix or Vegetable Broth Mix

preparation: In a blender, blend cantaloupe with Beaumes de Venise, lemon juice, Broth Mix, Salt, and Pepper. For a finer consistency, strain through a fine mesh sieve. Stir in more Beaumes or water to adjust texture, if you wish.
Ladle into bowls and garnish with parsley.
tips: Beaumes de Venise is a fortified sweet wine from the Rhone region in France.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
